target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs and developers looking to build AI-powered applications
pain_points: lack of coding experience preventing idea implementation
difficulty turning ideas into actual businesses
need to extract maximum value from AI gold rush
target_markets.market_size_indicators: $50 trillion AI market opportunity, billion people have ability to turn ideas into reality

problems_validated.problem: People with great ideas lack coding skills to build products
problems_validated.severity: High - prevents billion people from turning ideas into reality
problems_validated.market_gap: AI tools now enable non-coders to build applications

products_tools.name: Five Buy
products_tools.use_case: TikTok for you page before TikTok existed
products_tools.metrics: hundreds, thousands, tens of thousands of downloads

business_strategies.strategy: Fake it till you make it - appear to be in Silicon Valley ecosystem even when remote
business_strategies.implementation: Present yourself as part of the Silicon Valley community while building remotely
business_strategies.case_study: Greg's Five Buy success by appearing to be Silicon Valley-based while in Montreal

business_strategies.strategy: Build for acquisition by larger platforms
business_strategies.implementation: Create products that complement existing large platforms

problems_solutions.solution: Use AI tools like Bolt to build apps without coding

startup_ideas.idea: Revolutionary music app built with AI tools

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Thinking AI will replace humans entirely
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Understand AI augments and supercharges humans rather than replacing them
mistakes_to_avoid.example: People overestimating AI power due to commercial marketing

growth_tactics.tactic: Host large-scale hackathons to discover and fund innovation
growth_tactics.cost_estimate: over a million dollars in prizes
growth_tactics.results_expected: Discovery of breakthrough applications and talent

ai_workflows.workflow_name: AI voice cloning for business applications
ai_workflows.use_case: Creating AI representations of business leaders

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Focus on global reach and community engagement

trends_signals.trend: AI democratization enabling non-coders to build applications
trends_signals.opportunity: Billion people can now turn ideas into reality without coding skills

trends_signals.trend: Shift from billion-dollar to trillion-dollar company ambitions
trends_signals.opportunity: Massive scale opportunities in AI space
AI winning 95% of tasks against humans, improving to 96-98%

actionable_quotes.quote: A billion people have the ability to turn their ideas into reality, into actual businesses, into actual products
actionable_quotes.actionability: Leverage AI tools to build products regardless of technical background

actionable_quotes.quote: People don't even want to create billion-dollar companies. They're talking about trillion-dollar companies here
actionable_quotes.context: Describing ambition level in AI gold rush
actionable_quotes.actionability: Think bigger scale when building AI-powered businesses

actionable_quotes.quote: Most people think AI is going to replace them. But in reality, it's just going to augment them and supercharge them
actionable_quotes.actionability: Focus on AI augmentation rather than replacement fears

key_statistics.context: Overall AI market size being discussed

key_statistics.statistic: AI wins 95% of tasks against humans, improving to 96-98%
key_statistics.context: Current and projected AI capability levels

key_statistics.statistic: Over a million dollars in hackathon prizes
